page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content: {GAMES CHILDREN PLAY. The most popular games for boys are football,rugby,cricket and swimming. For girls they are netball,hockey, rounders and swimming. Apart from these popular games there are also some unusual ones. In one primary school {fireball }is played by the girls.The object of this game is to pass a ball around a circle of children.If the ball is dropped by anyone,that person has to run around the circle before the ball has been passed around it and placed on the spot where the person was previously standing.If the ball gets there first the person has to sit in the middle of the ring and suck her thumb.This continues until someone else drops the ball.Recently microcomputer games have become very popular especially on rainy days.
